company_tagline: Empowering your ideas with cutting-edge, reliable, and innovative software solutions
company_description: Softerio Solutions is a leading technology company specializing in AI, ML, web, and mobile app development. We provide innovative solutions to help businesses transform digitally and achieve their goals. With a team of experienced developers, designers, and consultants, we deliver high-quality software solutions tailored to your business needs.

price_policy.redirect_message_en: For accurate pricing, we need your project details. Please contact us on WhatsApp, Email, or book a Google Meet.
price_policy.redirect_message_ur: Sahi price bataanay ke liye humein aapke project ki details chahiye. Baraeh-karam WhatsApp, Email ya Google Meet per rabta karein.
price_policy.payment_terms: We accept 50% advance payment and 50% on project completion. For long-term projects, we offer milestone-based payments.

services.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
services.details: Custom AI automation, NLP bots, machine learning models, and smart systems. We develop intelligent solutions that learn, adapt, and improve over time.

services.name: Machine Learning (ML)
services.details: Predictive analytics, recommendation engines, model training and deployment. We build ML models that help businesses make data-driven decisions.

services.name: Web Development
services.details: Full-stack websites, business portals, dashboards, and e-commerce platforms. We create responsive, fast, and SEO-friendly websites.

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.details: Android, iOS, and cross-platform app development. We build native and hybrid mobile applications with excellent user experience.

services.name: Software Development
services.details: ERP, CRM, HRM, POS, Inventory, and custom internal systems. We develop enterprise-grade software solutions.

services.name: Cloud Services
services.details: AWS, Google Cloud, cloud migration, and app hosting. We help businesses move to the cloud and optimize their infrastructure.

services.name: UI/UX Design
services.details: Wireframes, user flows, modern UI, and design systems. We create beautiful and intuitive user interfaces.

services.name: Cybersecurity
services.details: App security audits, penetration testing, and data protection. We ensure your applications are secure and protected.

services.name: Technology Consulting
services.details: Business strategy, system consultancy, and startup tech guidance. We help businesses make the right technology decisions.

services.name: Data Analytics
services.details: Data analysis, business intelligence, and data visualization. We turn your data into actionable insights.

services.name: Blockchain Development
services.details: Smart contracts, DApps, and blockchain solutions. We develop decentralized applications and blockchain-based systems.

services.name: IoT Solutions
services.details: Internet of Things development, sensor integration, and IoT platforms. We connect devices and create smart solutions.

english: 1. Requirement Gathering – Understanding your business needs, goals, and expectations through detailed discussions.
2. Planning & Analysis – Finalizing project scope, features, timelines, and creating detailed project documentation.
3. UI/UX Design – Creating wireframes, mockups, and modern user interface designs based on your brand identity.
4. Development – Building backend, frontend, and full functionality with regular progress updates and demos.
5. Testing & QA – Comprehensive quality assurance, bug fixing, performance optimization, and security testing.
6. Deployment – Publishing on servers, app stores, or cloud platforms with proper configuration and setup.
7. Support & Maintenance – Ongoing updates, bug fixes, feature enhancements, and 24/7 technical support.
urdu: 1. Requirement Gathering – Aapke business ki needs, goals aur expectations ko detail se samajhna.
2. Planning & Analysis – Project scope, features aur timeline final karna aur detailed documentation banana.
3. UI/UX Design – Wireframes, mockups aur modern design banana jo aapke brand identity ke mutabiq ho.
4. Development – Backend, frontend aur tamam functionality tayyar karna with regular updates aur demos.
5. Testing & QA – Complete quality check, bugs fix, performance improve, aur security testing.
6. Deployment – Server, app store ya cloud par launch karna with proper setup.
7. Support & Maintenance – Continuous updates, bug fixes, new features, aur 24/7 technical support.

portfolio.portfolio_message_en: Sure! Here is our portfolio website where you can see all our work:
portfolio.portfolio_message_ur: Bilkul! Ye hamari portfolio website hai jahan aap hamara tamam kaam dekh saktay hain:

notable_projects.description: Full-featured online store with payment integration

notable_projects.name: AI Chatbot System
notable_projects.description: Intelligent customer support chatbot with NLP

company_info: Aapke team mein kitne log hain?
services: Kya aap mobile apps banate hain?
Kya aap AI systems develop karte hain?
Kya aap business automation karte hain?
Kya aap cloud services dete hain?
Kya aap UI/UX design karte hain?
process: Kya aap NDA sign karte hain?
Aap projects kaise handle karte hain?
timeline: How long will my project take?
Project kitne time mein complete hoga?
Kya aap jaldi delivery kar sakte hain?
technical: What programming languages do you use?
Aap kaun si technologies use karte hain?
Kya aap hosting provide karte hain?
Kya aap maintenance provide karte hain?
Aap kaun se programming languages use karte hain?
support: How many revisions do you offer?
Kya aap customer support dete hain?
Kya main changes request kar sakta hoon?
portfolio: Can I see your past work?
Kya main aapka past work dekh sakta hoon?
Aapne kaun se projects complete kiye hain?
team: Kya aapke paas dedicated developers hain?
Kya main monthly developers hire kar sakta hoon?
communication: Can we talk on a call?
Aap se kaise contact kar sakte hain?
Kya hum call par baat kar sakte hain?
Kya aap email support dete hain?
payment: What payment methods do you accept?
Kya aap advance payment lete hain?
Kya aap international payments accept karte hain?
Kaun se payment methods accept hain?
quality: What is your quality assurance process?
Aap quality kaise ensure karte hain?
Kya aap code test karte hain?
security: Do you follow security best practices?
How do you protect client data?
Kya aap security best practices follow karte hain?
Client data kaise protect karte hain?

faq_answers.nda: Yes, we provide NDA for all confidential projects. We understand the importance of protecting your business ideas and intellectual property.
faq_answers.delivery: Delivery timeline depends on project size, features, and complexity. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications may take 2-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during project planning.
faq_answers.source_code: Yes, you will get full source code upon project completion. All code, documentation, and assets are delivered to you.
faq_answers.support: We offer long-term support and maintenance packages. Our support includes bug fixes, updates, security patches, and feature enhancements.
faq_answers.communication: You can contact us on WhatsApp, Email, or Google Meet anytime. We maintain regular communication throughout the project.
faq_answers.pricing: Pricing depends on project requirements. We provide detailed quotes after understanding your needs. Contact us for accurate pricing.
faq_answers.technologies: We use modern technologies like React, Node.js, Python, AI/ML frameworks, cloud platforms, and more based on project requirements.
faq_answers.team_experience: Our team has 5+ years of average experience. We have experts in AI/ML, web development, mobile apps, cloud, and cybersecurity.
faq_answers.revisions: We offer unlimited revisions during development and 3-6 months of free support after project completion.
faq_answers.hosting: Yes, we can provide hosting services. We set up and configure servers on AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure based on your needs.
faq_answers.maintenance: We offer maintenance packages starting from $100/month. This includes bug fixes, updates, security patches, and technical support.
faq_answers.international: Yes, we work with clients from Pakistan, USA, UK, UAE, Canada, Australia, and many other countries.
faq_answers.payment_terms: We accept 50% advance payment and 50% on project completion. For long-term projects, we offer milestone-based payments.
faq_answers.timeline: Simple projects: 2-4 weeks, Medium projects: 1-3 months, Complex projects: 3-6 months. Exact timeline provided after requirement analysis.
faq_answers.quality: We follow industry best practices, conduct thorough testing, code reviews, and use automated testing tools to ensure high quality.
faq_answers.security: We implement security best practices including encryption, secure authentication, regular security audits, and compliance with data protection regulations.

testimonials.comment: Softerio Solutions delivered an excellent e-commerce platform. Their team was professional, responsive, and the quality was outstanding.
Unhone hamare liye ek behtareen mobile app banaya. Team bahut professional thi aur har step par communication maintain kiya.
The AI chatbot they developed has significantly improved our customer service. Highly recommended!
Softerio Solutions ne hamare liye ek complete ERP system develop kiya. Unka kaam bahut hi professional hai.

case_studies.title: E-commerce Platform Development
case_studies.challenge: Need for a scalable online store with payment integration
case_studies.solution: Developed full-stack e-commerce platform with React frontend, Node.js backend, and integrated payment gateways
case_studies.results: Increased online sales by 300%, improved user experience, and reduced cart abandonment rate

case_studies.title: AI-Powered Customer Support
case_studies.challenge: High volume of customer queries requiring 24/7 support
case_studies.solution: Developed intelligent chatbot using NLP and machine learning to handle customer queries automatically
case_studies.results: Reduced support tickets by 70%, improved response time, and increased customer satisfaction

case_studies.title: Mobile Banking Application
case_studies.challenge: Need for secure and user-friendly mobile banking solution
case_studies.solution: Developed cross-platform mobile app with React Native, implemented advanced security features and biometric authentication
case_studies.results: Increased mobile banking users by 250%, improved security, and enhanced user experience

additional_info.mission: To empower businesses with cutting-edge technology solutions that drive growth and success.
additional_info.vision: To be the leading technology solutions provider globally, known for innovation, quality, and client success.
why_choose_us: Experienced team with 5+ years average experience
